mapper.select: SELECT n.notice_id, n.notice_title, n.notice_content, n.notice_date, nf.noticefile_id, nf.notice_id, nf.noticefile_name, nf.noticefile_type, nf.noticefile_size, c.comment_id, c.notice_id, c.comment_content, c.comment_date FROM notice n LEFT OUTER JOIN noticefile nf ON n.notice_id = nf.notice_id LEFT OUTER JOIN comment c ON n.notice_id = c.notice_id WHERE n.notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_date = NOW() WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
